channel.title: Mitre on Embrace The Red

item.title: Survivorship Bias and Red Teaming
item.description: Survivorship bias is an interesting thing that we can observe nearly daily. It is the success stories of exponentially growing startups, the motivational speaker who shares their insights on how to be successful and so forth. What is it exactly? What is survivorship bias? Wikipedia defines it as “…the logical error of concentrating on the people or things that made it past some selection process and overlooking those that did not, typically because of their lack of visibility.
